job_purpose: Joining RWWA as a Functional Test Engineer to enhance software quality and contribute to the expansion of the digital footprint.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and execute automated test scripts for UI, mobile apps, and APIs
Utilize Selenium Webdriver, Appium, Rest Sharp, Postman, Nunit, Xunit, and C# for testing
Work in a fast-paced agile environment
Contribute to continuous testing and innovation in testing technology
required_qualifications: Minimum 5 years of experience in Software Testing and Test Automation
Solid understanding of software development and testing life cycles
Proficiency in automated testing tools and frameworks
Experience with CI/CD tools like Gitlab and Azure DevOps
Ability to work in a collaborative team setting
company_details: RWWA is revolutionizing the digital entertainment industry, offering a collaborative and innovative work environment with flexible arrangements. The company values diversity and inclusion, providing opportunities for growth and learning.
